body_html:
Hello there, I have a try on another virtual machine today and make it this time (a little slow though...).

CentOS7(x86_64)
gcc-4.8.5
python 3.5.2
no GPU option

Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package up-to-date:
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package
INFO: Elapsed time: 4577.867s, Critical_Path: 4385.53s

So I guess it's an issue related to 32bit arch......

body:
Hello there, I have a try on another virtual machine today and make it this time (a little slow though...).

CentOS7(x86_64)
gcc-4.8.5
python 3.5.2
no GPU option

> Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package up-to-date:
>     bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package
> INFO: Elapsed time: 4577.867s, Critical_Path: 4385.53s

So I guess it's an issue related to 32bit arch......
